sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs"> <x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <definition>Advises senior leadership on strategic S&T planning; Identifies and promotes applicable new technology to provide transformational capability from labs, industry, and academia; Acts as honest broker to leverage investments and provide independent/objective test and evaluation; Addresses over-arching issues for integration and interoperability; Implements stronger practices to improve technology transition processes; Serves as a relationship manager to facilitate coordination on S&T development and transition issues</definition> <number>GWBS0001303</number> <parent_task display_value="1.1.6 Research and Development (S&T)">2b158176db91a3008e9357935e961979</parent_task> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-25 15:59:55</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2f158176db91a3008e9357935e96197a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-25 16:38:49</sys_updated_on> <task_code>1.1.6.4</task_code> <task_name>1.1.6.4 Science and Technology</task_name> <task_title>Science and Technology</task_title> </x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs> </record_update>
